Hello,
Does anyone have any experience with deal duplication that includes line items. I'm an n8n user and been researching how to possibly do this via API but this process is a little beyond me. Any tips are welcomed :)
hey guys, one question: is there a way to recover files deleted from the design manager?
thanks, but thats for the filemanager, im looking for the design manager (templates, modules, css, js files)
Is anyone else having an `internal server` error for api get requests? just yesterday everything worked correctly and today it doesn't work anymore.

:wave-yeti: We now have a recording of CRM development breakout session presented at HubSpot.extend(). If you missed it or wanted to view it without the technical glitches we had, hereâ€™s where you can find the recap - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/HubSpot.extend-2022-recap>.

Here are some ways to stay posted
1. <#C04A3FUK8HK|crm-development-beta> slack channel to discuss topics related to the beta
2. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM-Development-Tools-Beta/gh-p/crm-development-tools-beta|Public community group>

Did you ever find a solution for line item sorting?

The best I can tell the orginail sort is by how the line items where added to the deal.

If reorderd using the Hubpost ui it will still output the order the items where added in.

I have looked at deal properties for line item order.
I have looked at line item properties for order.
Also have check association api calls to see if there is any infoamtion on UI order.

Any other ideas?

Hi All, I have been going between one trust and HubSpot to understand what exactly we need to ensure that our API keys do not depreciate. I have created a private app on HubSpot and I am stuck on the scopes One trust would need. I have asked One trust but they say it is up to HubSpot to say what they need.
